Package components

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
components.Unit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cavalry, Militia, Scout, Settler, Swordsman, Warrior
public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Unit superclass containing costs and fields to be filled by subclasses.
Author:
Connie Sun, Ryan Smith, Luke Hankins, Tim Gavlick
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Unit

      public Unit​(Player player, java.awt.Point coord)
      Make a new unit for the specified player at the city coordinates
      Parameters:
      player - player that owns the unit
      coord - location the unit will appear

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move​(int cost, int x, int y)
      Decrement the amount this unit can still move this turn and set the new coordinates
      Parameters:
      cost - integer representing the movement cost of this move.
      x - the unit's new x value on the grid
      y - the unit's new y value on our grid

    • getLabel

      public java.lang.String getLabel()
      Retrieve a label for this unit that can be used in the game UI.
      Returns:
      This unit's name or label

    • getOwner

      public Player getOwner()
      Retrieve the owner of this unit.
      Returns:
      Player object representing the owner of this unit.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      retrieve this unit's x coordinate within the grid
      Returns:
      int representing the x position

    • getY

      public int getY()
      retrieve this unit's y coordinate within the grid
      Returns:
      int representing the y position

    • getHP

      public double getHP()
      Getter for this unit's remaining health
      Returns:
      double representing health, if it is any value above 0 they are still alive.

    • getMaxHP

      public double getMaxHP()
      Get the unit's total possible health
      Returns:
      A double representing the unit's starting health

    • healUnit

      public void healUnit()
      Heal this unit by 5% of its max health

    • takeAttack

      public void takeAttack​(double damage)
      Decrement this unit's HP from an attack
      Parameters:
      damage - double representing the amount of damage dealt to our unit HP

    • getMovement

      public int getMovement()
      Retrieve remaining unit movement
      Returns:
      int representing number of standard tiles the unit can still move over

    • resetMovement

      public void resetMovement()
      Unit is done moving, reset its movement for next turn.

    • getAttackValue

      public double getAttackValue()
      Retrieve this unit's un-buffed attack value
      Returns:
      double representing the damage inflicted upon enemy units or cities.

    • getCost

      public double getCost​(java.lang.String unitType)
      Retrieve total cost of producing this unit
      Returns:
      double representing production cost of unit

    • getSight

      public int getSight()
      Retrieve this unit's sight value
      Returns:
      int representing radius of surrounding tiles that this unit can reveal.
